alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 28 at 10:06PM CST until March 02 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 29.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue falling to 16.4 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Noxubee River Macon 26.0 29.7 Mon 9 pm CST 25.8 22.6 20.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1015 AM CST.
